newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Creative launches new PC-DVD kit.
newsitem.headline: Creative launches new PC-DVD kit.

text.p: Multimedia company Creative Technology said on Tuesday it has launched its next generation PC-DVD (digital video disk) kit.
Called the Creative PC-DVD Encore DXr2, it is made up of a decoder card, the DynamicXtended Resolution Dxr2, and high performance PC-DVD ROM drive, for US$379.99.
The kit is fully compatible with all CD-ROM formats including CD-recordable media and CD-ROM speed exceeding 20X.
"It targets the high installed base of Pentium 100 MHz or higher-speed PCs, which is estimated to be over 50 million systems as well as new systems in the high-performance OEM market," Creative said.
The kit will be available in the third quarter, it said.
